author: marksan87
body:
#### PR description:

The PFRecHitQTestHCALThresholdVsDepth test is used for HBHE and HF PFRecHits. It can accept a parameter set vector for threshold cuts, one for each subdetector, but only one set can be saved at a time. This PR extends this class to accommodate parameter sets for multiple detector enums. 


#### PR validation:

Passes all matrix tests in `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`. 

This change only affects [HBHE](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/RecoParticleFlow/PFClusterProducer/python/particleFlowRecHitHBHE_cfi.py), where different thresholds are specified for barrel and endcap depths since Phase I. Physics changes for HBHE are minor.

[summary_pfcHBHE.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/8235671/summary_pfcHBHE.pdf)
[summary_pfcHF.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/8235672/summary_pfcHF.pdf)
[summary_jet.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/8235676/summary_jet.pdf)
[summary_fatjet.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/8235678/summary_fatjet.pdf)
